definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to own a controlling number of shares in a company
to accuse/to denounce/to make a complaint against/denunciation

sentences.english: Cancerians have a deep love for home, and they truly treasure their friends and family.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座的人是个恋家控，他们视朋友家人为珍宝。

sentences.english: The gaze in which technology enthusiasts are portrayed in film has changed too.
sentences.chinese: 我们观察到电影里对技术控的描绘变化很大。

sentences.english: Deep water drillers method is a suitable well killing method for deep water well control.
sentences.chinese: 深水司钻法是一种适应于深水井控的压井方法。

sentences.english: Multi-Touch gestures are commonly use for zooming and roatating features, nothing more.
sentences.chinese: 多触控手势通常用于缩放和旋转特性，此外就没有了。

sentences.english: How Many Megapixels Do you Need?
It is a strata bound skarn type deposit.
The water-releasing regulations of water-controlled bag were studied by pot method in greenhouse.
sentences.chinese: 该文采用温室盆栽法，研究了无耗能控水袋释水规律。

sentences.english: Low-velocity friction torque characteristics of proportional valve-controlled hydraulic motors are studied by experiment.
sentences.chinese: 对比例阀控液压马达低速摩擦转矩特性进行实验研究。

sentences.english: He's a golf freak. He's totally fanatical about the sport.
sentences.chinese: 他是个高尔夫控，他对那项运动很狂热。

sentences.english: So friendly strictly implemented, three tests to control.
sentences.chinese: 因此婴方喜严格地实行着三关把控。

sentences.english: Authorities say this is a complete control of the landing operation.
sentences.chinese: 当局称这是一场完全在控的降落行动。

definition: to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
in a nutshell/to put it briefly

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
